title: Is the Common Household Plant ‘Dieffenbachia’ Deadly?
subtitle: Viral web sites massively exaggerate the risk posed by these plants, even if that risk is rooted in a modicum of reality.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The household plant Dieffenbachia, one of the most common indoor plants, is so poisonous it can kill a child in one minute and an adult in 15 minutes.
